string.text: Suit Utility Package 'HPs-1'

Package containing assorted mechanical devices with different kinds of injectors and sterile fluid storage.
This package is not useful by itself, but can be combined with some other suit utility packages of the same quality to create a suit utility upgrade kit.
Suit Utility Package 'KrV'

Package containing assorted mechanical devices with different kinds of injectors and sterile fluid storage.
This package is not useful by itself, but can be combined with some other suit utility packages of the same quality to create a suit utility upgrade kit.

This package is not useful by itself, but can be combined with some other suit utility packages of the same quality to create a suit utility upgrade kit.

This package is not useful by itself, but can be combined with some other suit utility packages of the same quality to create a suit utility upgrade kit.
Ballistic Materials Package 'BRna'

Package containing various types of body armor plates and underlayers: Kevlar, titanium, beryl, aluminium, polymer and carbon fibre.
This package is not useful by itself, but can be combined with some other ballistic material packages of the same quality to create a suit armor upgrade kit.

CBRN Materials Package 'CHM-1'

Package containing assorted clothing materials resistant to high temperatures, voltages and CBRN threats.
This package is not useful by itself, but can be combined with some other CBRN material packages of the same quality to create a suit environmental protection upgrade kit.

Small Arms Tuning Package 'D-11'

Package containing a few assorted parts for various weapons, including trigger mechanisms, bolts and carriers, recoil springs and guide rods.
This package is not useful by itself, but can be combined with some other small arms tuning packages of the same quality to create a upgrade kit for weapon mechanisms.
